name: wid1_F2F1_module5
label: F2F 1: basic module (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: academic self concept: anticipated self-perceived ability; academic self concept: general self-perceived ability; academic self concept: self-perceived ability in math and German; academic self concept: self-perceived job ability; academic self-concept: verbal and spatial skill (preschool); achievement motivation in general; achievement motivation in school; after-school job; anticipated intrinsic motivation; anticipated learning motivation; commuting; current employment; desired school-leaving qualification; deviant behavior young children (e.g. lying/cheating, fighting with other children); expected probability to attain a degree; history of education and graduation: educational degrees, vocational training, year abroad; history of education and graduation: skipping/repeating a grade; intrinsic motivation for math and German; intrinsic motivation for school in general; involvement of (step-) parents (expectations, support, encouragement and punishment); job learning motivation; learning motivation for school in general; occupational status; parenting style of mother, father, partner of father, partner of mother (child report); partnership and marital status; perceived income equity; perceived job security and satisfaction; previous employment; recommendation for secondary education; required qualification for occupation; twin relationship: warmth, conflict, affection, hostility, rivalry; twin-specific questions for parents (e.g., dress twins alike); type of education / training; current status of education / qualification; wages, income; working time; year of immigration, country of birth, residential status, language spoken at home.

inv0100.question: inv0100
inv0100.name: inv0100
inv0100.label: We would like to ask you a few questions about your parents and school. Please tick whether the statements apply to your parents.
inv0100.label_de: Alter 11 bis 15 Jahre und besucht Schule: Wir wuerden Dir zuerst gerne ein paar Fragen zu Deinen Eltern und der Schule stellen. Bitte kreuze an, ob die Aussagen ueber Deine Eltern zutreffen. / Alter 16 bis 20 Jahre und besucht Schule: Wir wuerden Ihnen zuerst gerne ein paar Fragen zu Ihren Eltern und der Schule stellen. Bitte kreuzen Sie an, ob die Aussagen ueber Ihre Eltern zutreffen.

items.text: We would like to ask you a few questions about your parents and school. Please tick whether the statements apply to your parents.
items.text_de: Alter 11 bis 15 Jahre und besucht Schule: Wir wuerden Dir zuerst gerne ein paar Fragen zu Deinen Eltern und der Schule stellen. Bitte kreuze an, ob die Aussagen ueber Deine Eltern zutreffen. / Alter 16 bis 20 Jahre und besucht Schule: Wir wuerden Ihnen zuerst gerne ein paar Fragen zu Ihren Eltern und der Schule stellen. Bitte kreuzen Sie an, ob die Aussagen ueber Ihre Eltern zutreffen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I study for an exam, I know exactly how much effort my parents expect of me.
items.text_de: Wenn ich fuer eine Arbeit lerne, weiss ich ganz genau, wie viel Anstrengung meine Eltern von mir erwarten.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: My parents tell me that I can ask if I want to know something in more detail.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern erklaeren mir, dass ich nachfragen kann, wenn ich etwas genauer wissen will.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I get a poor grade, my parents complain and demand that I work harder.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, schimpfen meine Eltern mit mir und verlangen von mir, mehr zu lernen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: My parents comfort me and help me when I have problems in school.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern troesten mich und helfen mir, wenn ich in der Schule mal nicht klar komme.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: I know exactly what my parents expect of me in school.
items.text_de: Ich weiss genau, was meine Eltern in der Schule von mir erwarten.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When my parents study with me, they always encourage me to find the solution myself.
items.text_de: Wenn meine Eltern mit mir lernen, machen sie mir immer Mut, die Loesung selbst zu finden.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I get a poor grade, my parents threaten me with punishment (e.g., TV ban) if I do not work hard in the future to improve my grades.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, drohen meine Eltern mir Strafen an (z.B. Fernsehverbot), wenn ich in der naechsten Zeit nicht hart arbeite und meine Leistungen verbessere.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I don't understand something in class, I can talk to my parents about it.
items.text_de: Wenn ich im Unterricht etwas nicht verstehe, kann ich mit meinen Eltern darueber reden.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I bring home a class test, I already know beforehand whether my parents will be disappointed.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine Klassenarbeit mit nach Hause bringe, weiss ich schon vorher ob meine Eltern enttaeuscht sind.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: My parents encourage me to ask questions in class when I didn't understand something.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern ermuntern mich im Unterricht Fragen zu stellen, wenn ich etwas nicht verstanden habe.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: When I get a poor grade, my parents accuse me of having too many other things on my mind and not caring enough about school.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, werfen meine Eltern mir vor, zu viele andere Dinge im Kopf zu haben und mich nicht genug um die Schule zu kuemmern.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

items.text: My parents are interested in what I have learned in school.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern interessieren sich dafuer, was ich in der Schule gelernt habe.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on Two New German Twin Studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9(6), 787-790. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1375/twin.9.6.787)

asc0100.label_de: Jetzt habe ich ein paar Fragen an Dich:

Unraveling measurement and multidimensional self-concept structure. Developmental Psychology, 38(3), 376-393. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1037/0012-1649.38.3.376)

items.text_de: Bist Du gut im Lesen?

answers.label: -82: child didn't understand the question
answers.label_de: -82: Kind hat die Frage nicht verstanden

answers.label: -81: child understood the question, but doesn't have an answer
answers.label_de: -81: Kind hat die Frage verstanden, weiss aber keine Antwort

answers.label: 1: yes, normally good, about like other children
answers.label_de: 1: ja, normal gut, also so wie andere Kinder

answers.label: 2: yes, really good, better than other children
answers.label_de: 2: ja, richtig gut, also besser als andere Kinder

answers.label: 3: no, not so good, not as good as other children
answers.label_de: 3: nein, nicht so gut, also nicht so gut wie andere Kinder

answers.label: 4: no, not good at all, not as good as other children at all
answers.label_de: 4: nein, gar nicht gut, also viel weniger gut als andere Kinder

pas0200m.question: pas0200m
pas0200m.name: pas0200m
pas0200m.label: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name mother]?
pas0200m.label_de: Im Folgenden moechte ich Dich ein paar Dinge zu Dir und Deiner Familie fragen. Wir fangen an mit Fragen zu Deiner Mutter [Name]. Es gibt keine richtigen und falschen Antworten, bitte sag mir einfach, wie Du darueber denkst. Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und Deiner Mutter [Name] vor?

pas0200f.name: pas0200f
pas0200f.label: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name father]?
pas0200f.label_de: Nun moechte ich Dir noch ein paar Fragen zu Deinem Vater [Name] stellen. Auch hier gibt es keine richtigen oder falschen Antworten, sag mir einfach, wie Du darueber denkst. Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und Deinem Vater [Name] vor?

items.description: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The strengths and difficulties questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European Child & Adolescent Psychiatry, 7(3), 125-130. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1007/s007870050057)

items.text: Would you say that you NEVER cheat or lie, sometimes cheat or lie, or very often cheat or lie?
items.text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass Du NIE mogelst oder luegst, MANCHMAL mogelst oder luegst, oder GANZ OFT mogelst oder luegst?
items.description: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The strengths and difficulties questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European Child & Adolescent Psychiatry, 7(3), 125-130. [[URL link]](https://doi.org/10.1007/s007870050057)

items.text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of other twin]?

items.text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of other twin] like tease, bug or call him or her names?

items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of other twin] better than she treats you?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln. Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des anderen Zwillings] besser behandelt als Dich?

items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of twin 2] better than she treats you?
